content: the mixtape medley blanket is a collaboration with knitcraft for hobbycraft i have designed this blanket to bring you a fun cal to help you explore new stitches try new colour combinations and crochet along with us hobbycraft has released each installment of the pattern for you to enjoy every week we worked on new sections of the blanket and after eight weeks new & wonderful blankets were made to enjoy forever you can find the written pattern for the us terms on the zeens and roger blog with the 1 easy to print pdf download the uk terms are on the hobycraft website in each of the 8 week installments to download new to crochet we ve created a collection of technique videos to help you with each stitch featured within the pattern so you can build you skills as you crochet with us each week find the videos on the hobbycraft youtube channel they use uk terms but are helpful visually if you use us terms make sure you tag us in your progress with #mixtapemedleycal and tag knitcrafthq /people/knitcrafthq and @zeensandroger for the blanket you will need knitcraft everyday dk 100% acrylic 137m/50g purple ya x 3 balls mint yb x 4 hot pink yc x 2 beige yd x 5 orange ye x 2 teal yf x 2 light blue yg x 4 brown yh x 2 peach yi x 3 barbie pink yj x 2 red yk x 2 blue yl x 2 4mm hook this blanket uses a multiple of 36 stitches plus 1
